title: PSA: Right now on the PBE, Scuttle Crab respawn at 3:15 instead of 2:15
body: This might change the jungle meta.

replies.body:
oh finally a change a change that makes mid lane less reliant
I hate it as a mid laner that I'm forced to follow my Jungler's butt every time he goes for scuttle without even having the chance to shove the wave , just for both of us die and get behind for free if I'm playing an Immobile champion.
It benefits non lvl2 gankers too

> [{quoted}](name=Abibyama II,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZN3aINzM,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-04-20T14:36:10.119+0000)
>
> This might change the jungle meta.

Riot's balance motto, at least once a year.
